  cat('',
    glue::glue('\n\n## [{{ppl$title}}]({{ppl$link}})\n\n::: {layout="[20,-2,20]" layout-valign="center"}\n\n![]({{ppl$picture}})\n\n{{ppl$description}}\n\n:::', .open = "{{", .close = "}}"),
    "\n",
    "",
    sep = ""
)
}
